Housing

The Council provides an estates management service for land and property in the area.

Services include:

  • Sales
  • Lettings
  • Acquisitions
  • Property Management
  • Asset Valuations
  • Insurance Valuations
  • Professional Property Advice

We offer a broad range of property, both for sale and for rent. Properties range from a lock-up shop to a major retail development, individual garage sites to major residential development sites, a single workshop/unit to an estate of industrial sites.
